29.72.text:
Ladies and gentlemen,
please welcome your favourite
family-friendly entertainer,

35.68.text:
who would never insult anyone,
and in the current climate
would very much like to keep his job.

57.36.text:
Welcome to another adorable and
harmless Never Mind The Buzzcocks.

63.80.text:
This week's guest team captain
is a national treasure

66.64.text:
and somebody whose family I very
much respect. It's Jack Dee.

75.48.text:
Their last single was inspired by
lesbians but we won't be dwelling

79.40.text:
on that filth tonight,
thank you very much.
It's Alphabeat singer, Stine.

88.52.text:
And she's just hosted Channel
4's Sex Education Show, where

91.76.text:
I assume the lesson was "not before
marriage and never to be enjoyed".
It's Anna Richardson.

98.52.text: And on Phill's team this evening...

102.72.text:
She's the winner of ITV2's wonderful
Celeb Air, who only had a small role

106.56.text:
in turning the nation into
violent materialistic murderous
hoodies with So Solid Crew.

113.16.text:
And he's a comedian, writer
and communist.

117.16.text:
But tonight he has agreed to
tone all of that down for some
traditional, risk-free quiz fun.

122.04.text:
It's pillar of the
establishment, Alexei Sayle.

126.96.text:
Those are the teams.
Let's have a respectful round of

129.76.text:
applause for them and the days when
you could leave your doors unlocked.

We've got to be frightened

that be, you know?

All right, I do voiceovers

LAUGHTER

242.52.text:
..I'm sneering

There's a question.

Alexei, you used to be a Maoist.

286.56.text:

299.40.text:
"I said, do you want some nuts?!

It was more like,

324.60.text:

328.64.text:
And then... I saw Rik Mayall in

332.72.text:
Oh no! It got a huge laugh. Yeah,
it's been done before. Oh!

337.20.text:
He got a huge laugh, but then
he was stuck in that outfit
for another 90 minutes.

343.00.text:
You can't intimidate a heckler
in a bunny suit. Mmm.

353.24.text:
I don't care, you're still shit.

360.00.text:
See, you can't

451.92.text:

What about Stine from

465.52.text: Welcome to the show. Thank you.

That song you've got, Boyfriend,

475.80.text:
I assume that the film

ashamed of what they'd done and

489.24.text:

Oh good, you're not a... Are

I think the most shocking

543.60.text:

569.36.text:

this works, and I was only told

619.16.text: Stop when you feel you want to!

630.04.text:
30,000 by the end of the week,

the leading Sheikh in Dubai

1192.20.text:
Each team is given four famous
people, and they have to guess
the odd one out -

1196.48.text:
Or, in our clever, twisted idea,

1209.88.text:

whereas all the others have had

is the odd one out because

1669.04.text: It made it all worth it.

1673.48.text: And so to the final scores.

1676.36.text:
Phill's team have eight points.
Jack's team have nine points.

1687.72.text:
So, thanks to Phill, Lisa
and Alexei, Jack, Stine and Anna.

1691.76.text:
This has been Never Mind The
Buzzcocks. I've had a lovely, safe
time, and hope you have too.

1696.08.text:
But if there's anything at all you
don't like about me, just let me
know and I'll be happy to change.

1728.04.text: Subtitles by Red Bee Media Ltd
